description: The Targus 16-Inch Spruce Laptop Slipcase with Shoulder strap is designed to protect up to 16-Inch widescreen laptops from dust or scratches. The slipcase is constructed of 100 percentage polyester material and features a large zippered front pocket to store a notepad, mouse, power adapter or other necessities. The padded shoulder strap and cushioned handles provide comfortable carry options. The green lining brightens the interior making it easy to view darker accessory items inside of the bag. The Spruce Laptop Slipcase is PVC-free and nickel-free to help reduce toxins during the manufacturing process and includes recyclable plastic components. Perfect for use during travel or between meetings when a laptop and core accessories is all you need.
title: Targus Spruce EcoSmart Sleeve Designed for 16 Inch Laptops TBS045US (Black)
